SEARCH
Package sustech.cs304.service

Interface FriendApi

All Known Implementing Classes:
FriendApiImpl
public interface FriendApi
FriendApi is an interface that defines methods for managing friendships. It provides methods to apply for friendship, accept or reject friendship requests, and retrieve lists of friends and friend requests.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    acceptFriendship(String applicantId, String targetId)
    Accepts a friendship request from a user.
    void
    applyFriendship(String applicantId, String targetId)
    Applies for friendship with a target user.
    List<User>
    getFriendList(String userId)
    Retrieves a list of friends for a given user ID.
    List<User>
    getFriendRequestList(String userId)
    Retrieves a list of friend requests for a given user ID.
    void
    rejectFriendship(String applicantId, String targetId)
    Rejects a friendship request from a user.

  • Method Details

    • applyFriendship

      void applyFriendship(String applicantId, String targetId)
      Applies for friendship with a target user.
      Parameters:
      applicantId - The ID of the user who is applying for friendship.
      targetId - The ID of the user who is being applied to.

    • acceptFriendship

      void acceptFriendship(String applicantId, String targetId)
      Accepts a friendship request from a user.
      Parameters:
      applicantId - The ID of the user who applied for friendship.
      targetId - The ID of the user who is accepting the friendship.

    • rejectFriendship

      void rejectFriendship(String applicantId, String targetId)
      Rejects a friendship request from a user.
      Parameters:
      applicantId - The ID of the user who applied for friendship.
      targetId - The ID of the user who is rejecting the friendship.

    • getFriendList

      List<User> getFriendList(String userId)
      Retrieves a list of friends for a given user ID.
      Parameters:
      userId - The ID of the user.
      Returns:
      A list of User objects representing the user's friends.

    • getFriendRequestList

      List<User> getFriendRequestList(String userId)
      Retrieves a list of friend requests for a given user ID.
      Parameters:
      userId - The ID of the user.
      Returns:
      A list of User objects representing the user's friend requests.
